US study J Friedberg et al find promising survival result MPM combine eP/D , EPP , intra-operative PDT chemotherapy ( cisplatin-pemetrexed ) , median overall survival 31.7 month . However , definitive value intra-pleural PDT combine eP/D treatment MPM still need validate . The multimodal treatment establish Lille , French national expert centre MPM , help american colleague .
